Directions: In a bowl, combine the flour and sugar. Cut in butter until crumbly. Stir in walnuts. Press onto the bottom and up the sides of a greased 10-in. pie plate. Bake at 375 degrees F for 14-16 minutes or until set and edges are lightly browned. cool on a wire rack.

For filling, in a bowl, dissolve gelatin in water. Stir in cranberry sauce, cranberry juice and orange peel. Cover and refrigerate until slightly thickened, about 1 hour. Fold in whipped cream. pour into crust. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours.
Ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package cranberry or strawberry Jell-O®
